SA20n1330:1: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1330:5: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca |
SA20n1330:19: smṛtyupasthānānyupādāya sarve saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāścatasraśca paryeṣaṇāścatvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭānyabhisamasya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyacaryetyucyate |
SA20n1330:21: dvau ca pūrvanirdiṣṭāvaprameyau vineyāprameyaśca vinayopāyāprameyaśca [sarvasattvaparipāko yathānirdiṣṭaḥ] sattvaparipākapaṭale bodhisattvasyābhisamasya sattvaparipākacaryetyucyate |
SA20n1330:23: tatrāsaṃkhyeyatraya-dīrghakālasamudāgamātsvabhāvaviśuddhiviśeṣāttadanyebhyaḥ sarvalaukikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalamūlebhyaḥ paramabodhiphalaparigrahāccaite daśa dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti |
SA20n1330:28: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca |
SA20n1330:30: eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1330:34: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti |
SA20n1330:37: samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate |
SA20n1330:39: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati |
SA20n1330:42: iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ |
SA20n1330:47: sahajā ca kuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā |
SA20n1330:51: sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai |
SA20n1330:53: sahajañca mativaipulyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ vicakṣaṇatā ca sarvārtheṣu |
SA20n1330:54: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1330:55: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha] sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā |
SA20n1330:66: etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti |
SA20n1330:68: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam |
